newsitem.title: FRANCE: France to sell 20 to 22 bln Ffr of OATs Thursday.
newsitem.headline: France to sell 20 to 22 bln Ffr of OATs Thursday.

text.p: France is to offer between 20 and 22 billion francs of government bonds (OATs) at its next scheduled auction on April 3, the Treasury said on Tuesday.
The Treasury will offer the current 10-year benchmark bond, the 5.50 percent April 25, 2007 OAT.

The Treasury also said it would offer the 6.75 percent April 25, 2004 OAT and the 2009 TEC 10 variable rate OAT. It said the TEC 10 would make up two to four billion francs of the total amount of bonds sold.
All three lines have a payment date of April 25.
